message_templates.help_message: To get a quote for a stock, simply text the ticker with a $ at the beginning. For example, to get a quote for Microsoft, text $MSFT. Multiple quotes can be retrieved by entering multiple symbols separated by a space. To repeat the last query, text LAST.
message_templates.error_message: There was a problem retrieving the quote(s), try again
message_templates.max_exceeded: There is a maximal retrieval limit of $max_quotes quotes per request
